fields.name: Lavender
fields.method_of_extraction: Steam distilled from the flowers and leaves.
fields.description_short: Cleansing and refreshing, this is soothing for the skin and mind.
fields.description_long: A versatile and popular essential oil, lavender is a calming fragrance and is particularly renown for its ability to relax and promote restful sleep. Its rejuvenating and soothing effects make it an effective skin treatment and a good skin healer.
fields.the_essential_oil: Colourless or pale yellow, lavender oil has a floral, slightly hard, sweet aroma. Some oils have synthetic compounds. Check the label for the name Lavendula angustifolia.
fields.the_plant: Lavendula angustifolia is commonly used for essential oils. Lavandin or spike lavender is a hybrid with medicinal aroma and antiseptic and tonic properties.
fields.safe_usage: Non-toxic and non-irritant. Can be used neat on small areas.

fields.name: Bergamot
fields.method_of_extraction: Expressed from the citrus fruit's peel.
fields.description_short: Uplifting and fruity, this is balancing for the skin and calming for the emotions.
fields.safe_usage: Contains components that may cause sensitisation in some people. Recommend use in less than 1% dilution on the skin.

fields.name: Basil
fields.description_short: Stimulating, sweet and peppery, this is a great restorative when overwrought.
fields.safe_usage: Contains components that may cause sensitisation in some people. Recommend use in less than 1% dilution on the skin.

fields.name: Cardamom
fields.method_of_extraction: Steam distilled from the aromatic seed.
fields.description_short: Comforting and sweet, this is soothing for the mind and beneficial for digestion.
fields.safe_usage: Non-toxic and non-irritant. Avoid using in children under 7 years old.
